Was told at time of order 20 mins and 1 hour later I get my order and total refund... that's last time I do business  there. Hunts brothers is better....and that's how I got my wings...

text: I paid for 2 sauces. I asked 3 times if my sauce was in there because my hands were full and was reassured my sauce was in the box. ALL THE WAY HOME AND NO SAUCE! Wasted my gas !

text: Pizza Hut in Opp Alabama is wonderful. The waitress this makes the second time we've had her. She is awesome.

name: Nicholas Worden
text: Excellent service! Food taste great, and my order was hot and fresh. I'll definitely be coming back.

name: Sandra Thompson
text: I used to work at Pizza Hut in the early 80's and the pizza was great. This was just like it. Really good pan pizza and salad bar. Very clean and the waitress was really nice. I wish the Pizza Hut in Wetumpka and Montgomery had a buffet like this one in Opp. I really enjoyed eating lunch there.

name: D Rogers
text: Service terrible pizza over cooked and expensive

name: Heather Hinson
text: Although this location isn't the nicest, the staff are awesome. They are attentive, friendly and on top of things. The food is good. The salad bar is good and well stocked and the buffet is also well stocked. I always have a great meal when I come here.

name: Amy Powell
text: The prices are excellent for the pizza. It is a grab and go which is great with kids. I have never had a bad pizza.  The selection of pizza is limited,  but if you are great with the basic pizzas this is a place for you.

name: Kymberly Ellis
text: Contact less curb side is a joke. They do not bring out the food timely nor ever answer the phone so they know your there.  If your not able to go inside and pick up better select another location.  Poor customer service.  Yes I filed a formal complaint.

name: Juliana McMullin
text: I haven't been here a lot of times, but I have been underwhelmed when I have been there. The servers in my experience we're not friendly or attentive, but that may have changed since it's been a while. The all-you-can-eat lunch buffet was a ‚Ä¶More

name: Savanah Lassiter
text: The customer service was great! It seemed like they were understaffed as our order took about 45 minutes to receive (dine in.) Our second pizza could have been cooked longer as the crust was still a bit doughy but we had toddlers with us and needed to hurry out so we didn't complain. Overall a good experience.
